Darren, could you post your files in the Files area?  It might be
helpful to other people too who want to compile under Windows.

ken

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Darren Izzard" <zysyshelp@y...> wrote:
> 
> >Yes, I'm having troubles compiling NEAT.  I am on a windows
> >system, and would like some help in getting all the correct packages
> >and version etc. in order to compile and run the NEAT experiments.
> 
> I have a working version of the NEAT source which will compile under
Cygwin
> using an ordinary make, if you'd like me to send it to you. I think
you just
> need to get hold of the latest SWIG. (The usual Cygwin setup program
will
> handle this for you.) I have, however, removed all of the graphics code,
> simply because I didn't really need it and it just simplified the
porting
> process. If you do need NEAT's graphics output, you'll have to sort
that out
> yourself.
> 
> --Darren
